name: Deepin Music
description: Deepin Music is a beautiful and easy-to-use music player developed by deepin technology team. It can not only play local music, but also get massive online music resources through powerful plug-in extended function. You can enjoy the music smoothly and freely by Its built-in audio format transcoding function.

en_US.description: Deepin Music is a beautiful and easy-to-use music player developed by deepin technology team. It can not only play local music, but also get massive online music resources through powerful plug-in extended function. You can enjoy the music smoothly and freely by Its built-in audio format transcoding function.
en_US.name: Deepin Music

zh_CN.description: 深度音乐是深度科技团队开发的一款美观易用的音乐播放器。深度音乐不仅可以播放本地音乐，还可以通过强大的插件扩展功能来获取海量的在线音乐资源。其自带的音频格式转码功能，更能让您畅听无极限！
zh_CN.name: 深度音乐
